title: zool710-intro-marguerite-butler
text: This is the repository for Marguerite Butler in Zool 710.

title: zool710-intro-marguerite-butler
text:
Four fun facts about me

I love to cook and eat good food, when I have time. These days it is mostly on the weekends, when I get to share with my parents. I love to try new recipes, these days mostly from Korean or any Asian cuisine, Mexican, or Italian cuisines.
I have one kid (senior in college! Yikes) and one puppy (turns 12 in January).
I have done fieldwork in Hawaii, the Caribbean, North America, Central America, Southern Africa, Papua New Guinea, East Asia (Japan), and Australia. Still on my bucket list is Madagascar.
I am involved with the Comparative Phylogenetics Methods in R community (here is a listerv)R-sig-phylo, and have contributed to the OUCH package in R. We are folks interested in learning by comparing species, analyzing data across phylogenetic trees.

title: zool710-intro-marguerite-butler
text:
The Majesty of Wildlife
There is so much bad news these days. This year I wanted to see beauty. This is the stunning photo gallery of Wildlife Photographer of the Year competition from the Natural History Museum

Wildlife Photographer of the Year
